title: Christie Love! (1974 Crime) Teresa Graves | When you need a cop who's no lady...

sources.title: Christie Love! (1974 Crime) Teresa Graves | When you need a cop who's no lady...
sources.description:
Beauty, Brains...and a Badge
Adventures of sexy & sassy black undercover cop Christie Love.

Get Christie Love!  was originally broadcast in January 1974 as an ABC Movie of the Week, and was turned int 2 seasons & 23 episodes.

Director: William A. Graham
Writer: George Kirgo
Genre: Cult film, Drama, Crime

Main Actors:
Teresa Graves - Christie Love
Charles Cioffi - Lieutenant Matt Reardon 
Jack Kelly - Captain Arthur Ryan 
Michael Pataki - Sergeant Pete Gallagher, Christie's partner
Dennis Rucker - Lieutenant Steve Belmont
Harry Guardino - Captain Casey Reardon
Louise Sorel - Helena Varga
Paul Stevens - Enzo Cortino
Ron Rifkin - Normand


00:00 Full movie with subtitles
00:07 Christie Love a determined and resourceful cop is on a mission to uncover a "substance" operation.
05:21 Christie interrogates a suspect about the "H" supply chain, demanding details on its source, distribution, and key players.
15:12 Discovers Helena Farga’s connection to Enzo Cortino and learns about a mysterious ledger that could expose the entire operation.
30:52 Christie confronts Helena about her past and her role in Cortino’s empire, uncovering secrets that could bring him down.
46:15 Uncovers the truth about Helena’s son and his connection to Cortino, revealing a deeper layer of manipulation and danger.
57:27 Helena reveals the existence of Cortino’s ledger, agreeing to cooperate with Christie in exchange for protection.
1:00:09 Christie secures the ledger, which contains detailed records of Cortino’s criminal activities, marking a turning point in her mission.
1:07:02 Christie confronts Cortino with the evidence, ensuring justice is served and bringing her perilous journey to a triumphant close.

Does this film make the cut?  Does it deserve a place in ⭐ B-Movie Hall of Fame ??
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2gsu7VGzgdYUNFx3C0xMQLKXcmuCW5w5
